edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course

Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Activity
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Course
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Conflict, java.lang.Comparable<Course>

    public class Course
extends Activity
implements java.lang.Comparable<Course>
    Contains and validates all the information of a college course and formatting functions for the start and end time. Has a name, title, section number, number of credit hours, instructor id and meeting days. Depending on how the class meets, a course has also have a start and end time. time.
    Author:
    Alex Johnson (abjohns6@ncsu.edu)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Course

        public Course(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String section,
              int credits,
              java.lang.String instructorId,
              int enrollmentCap,
              java.lang.String meetingDays,
              int startTime,
              int endTime)
        Creates a Course for the given name, title, section, credit hours, instructor ID, meeting days, start time and end time.
        Parameters:
        name - the course name starts with a 3 letter department code and followed by a 3 digit class code
        title - the title of the class, more descriptive than the name
        section - the section number of the course
        credits - the number of credit hours for the course
        instructorId - the school's id of the instructor
        meetingDays - the meeting days of the course. A combination of weekdays or arranged
        startTime - the start time for the course in military time
        endTime - the end time for the course in military time
        enrollmentCap - The enrollment capacity

        title - the title of the class, more descriptive than the name

        credits - the number of credit hours for the course
        instructorId - the school's id of the instructor
        meetingDays - the meeting days of the course. A combination of weekdays or arranged
        enrollmentCap - The enrollment capacity

      • setMeetingDays

        public void setMeetingDays(java.lang.String meetingDays)
        Sets the meeting days of the course. Must be a string of the characters M,T,W,H,F or just A.
        Overrides:
        setMeetingDays in class Activity
        Parameters:
        meetingDays - the String to set meeting days to
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the meeting days string consists is null or the empty string. If meeting days isn't a string of the characters M,T,W,H,F or just A.
